channel.title: Banner sigs
channel.description:
If you were to put a banner in your sig would it come up in your posts?
--edit-- link the ones found here: http://www.usersigs.com/site/index.php

item.title: Banner sigs
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

you can, it just doesn’t show up. for instance there is an image in my sig, but no one can see it.
or can they. scary theme song

anyway, its pretty pointless.

but what you can do is link to an image in your sig, or link to a website, if it is approved by a global mod or admin.

Read full topic
